name: antitag
description:
Anti Tag is a game of running and jumping for four players. One player is designated as "it", and if that players comes into contact with another player, the new player is now "it".

This was made in <8hrs for RokkinCat's July Hack & Tell here in my hometown of Milwaukee.

You need dual analog controllers to play (e.g. X360, PS4, XB1). XB controls are:

  • Tilt Analog Stick - Move
  • Mash A - Run/PowerUp
  • Tap X - Jump

Jump starts at 2m tall, and each recent PowerUp pressed increases jump height by 1m until Jump is 4m tall.
